team.title: Meet our leadership
team.description: Our team shares a common vision of helping businesses around the globe make an impact by powering their software engineering initiatives. We foster knowledge-sharing culture and cumulative innovation to deliver proven results for our clients.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: You haven’t created a project yet. Get started by selecting a template or start from an empty project.

documents.title: Add team members to your documents
documents.description: You haven’t created and added any team members to your documents yet.

learning.forms: Forms are used to collect data from the user. There are two types of forms in Angular: Template Driven and Reactive.
learning.pipes: Pipes are a way to transform data in Angular templates. Pipes are used in interpolation and binding expressions with the pipe operator, |.
learning.http: HTTP is a protocol that allows us to communicate with remote servers. Angular has a built-in HTTP client that allows us to communicate with remote servers using the HTTP protocol.
